name: Far Realm Epics 2: Holy Return
description:
You open your eyes in Synta Nefatum, the planet of destiny, the heart of the universe, the terminal of space and time. You don't remember your past because of the interplanetary tides you're constantly exposed to. Explore the planet, Explore the secrets of the universe and find out why you were sent to the planet.

Features from the game:


  • 3D Realistic view
  • Nearly 30 turn-based attack styles
  • Nearly 20 readable books
  • 10 different dungeons and their stories
  • Collectible mystery plants and flowers
  • 4 learnable languages and exam systems
  • System of buying seeds, selling crops and growing plants
  • 23 Special abilities
  • Obtaining new items with the alchemy system
  • Mining and ore processing system
  • Day Cycle and Special Dreams
  • WoodCutting and fishing system
  • Ney Flute System
  • And more
